channel.title: How do I make my client auto download cache?
channel.description: Okay so I am wanting my client to auto download the cache without you having to manually add the cache to your C drive. Can anyone tell me how to do this? My server is a 657.

item.title: How do I make my client auto download cache?
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

hmmmâ€¦a 657, you would just perhaps, go to rics webclient tutorial, get the autocache downloader, and code it properly to run on your client. Then again, i dont know if that would work, because thats for 317. Is it a 657 client also?
But yeah, you could try what i said if you want.
